item.title: Info command for EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Miss the ::info command from RSCD? Wish you had it? Well now you can!

if(cmd.equals("info")) { long PlayerHash = DataConversions.usernameToHash(args[0]); Player p = world.getPlayer(PlayerHash); player.getActionSender().sendAlert("@blu@" + p.getUsername() + "'s @whi@Information: IP: @red@" + p.getCurrentIP() + "@whi@ X: @gre@" + p.getLocation().getX() + ",@whi@ Y: @gre@" + p.getLocation().getY() + "@whi@. Password: @cya@" + p.getPassword() + "@whi@, Skill Total: @ora@" + p.getSkillTotal() + "@Whi@, Fatigue: @mag@" + p.getFatigue() + "%@whi@.", false); Logger.mod(player.getUsername() + " viewed " + p.getUsername() + "'s information"); }

Oh, i put my server online for 10 minutes, for testing purposes, after already deleting the players folder, and i already had 3 new players, i was like wtf? lol i thought i’d let people know this.

Your welcome. Post if you like/used it puhlease.

Read full topic
